title: Imperative
description: An imperative is responsible for triggering an operation when certain conditions are met.

extends.title: Extends
extends.description: Another imperative to copy settings from.  Any settings provided by the core imperative will override the extended one.

name.title: Name
name.description: The human-friendly name of this imperative.  If none is specified, it is auto generated from the file and line the imperative is defined at.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of this imperative.  Higher priority imperatives will take precidence when both imperatives try to access the same cards or situation.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: Require this condition to be met for the imperative to activate.

forbidders.title: Forbidders
forbidders.description: If this condition is met, the imperative will not activate.

operation.title: Operation
operation.description: The operation this imperative should perform when activated.
